title: MinIO Object Manager
shortdesc: Enables CRUD operations on MinIO storage buckets.
desc: The MinIO Object Manager allows GPT to perform CRUD operations on MinIO storage buckets. It supports uploading, downloading, updating, and deleting objects. Authentication is managed through MinIO's access and secret keys. This tool is essential for managing data storage in MinIO buckets programmatically.
author: David Cannan, Cdaprod
